document.full_text: on tuesday, john rice lost the runoff election and his job as alderman. now he has a few words for the firefighter who defeated him and the news media, whom he blames for his loss.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: john rice reflects on losing
lines_and_colors: on tuesday, john rice lost the runoff election and his job as alderman. now he has a few words for the firefighter who defeated him and the news media, whom he blames for his loss.
